fields.value: Indonesia's oil palm area and production statistics

authorName.value: Directorate General of Estate Crops, Ministry of Agriculture

datasetContactName.value: Directorate General of Estate Crops, Ministry of Agriculture

dsDescriptionValue.value: The database contains information by province and district and by type of producers on the area, production, productivity of oil palm plantation and number of labor working in the plantation and industry and number independent farmers. Three different types of producer are privately owned, state-owned companies and independent farmer or people plantation. If available, type of producers also is further divided as foreign and national companies. Oil palm plantation area are divided into three different types, nemaly immature or young and mature plantations, and damaged crops. The area is expressed in ha and production is in ton. Productivity figures are expressed in ton per hectare.

keywordValue.value: oil palm area production productivity Indonesia

producerName.value: Directorate General of Estate Crops, Ministry of Agriculture

distributorName.value: CGIAR Research Program on Forests, Trees and Agroforestry Dataverse
